description: Beautify Rabbid Peach's Triple-Troll with the ancestral finery of Bwahkura! A grip fashioned in the style of ancient swords, elegant and balanced pale colors...but don’t let its floral ornaments fool you: woe betide any enemy who crosses its path in Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope.
name: MARIO + RABBIDS® SPARKS OF HOPE - RABBID PEACH BWAHKURA SKIN
